title: US Urges China to Let ‘Substantially Undervalued’ Yuan Rise
description: The US Treasury characterized the yuan as “substantially undervalued,” and called on China to allow its exchange rate to strengthen in a timely and orderly way.
content: The US Treasury characterized the yuan as “substantially undervalued,” and called on China to allow its exchange rate to strengthen in a timely and orderly way.
